name: Back to Home!
description:
We hope you enjoy and have fun.

Stay safe, stay home and keep playing xD

How to Play:

Press "E" to start running.

Press the "A" and "D" keys to turn to the left and right sides respectively.

You must cross the line without touching the Corona Virus.

If you missed the phrase "stay home" in your language, please feel welcome to write it in the comments so that we can add it to the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Como jogar:

Pressione "E" para começar a correr.

Pressione as teclas "A" e "D" para virar para os lados esquerdo e direito, respectivamente.

Você deve cruzar a linha sem tocar no Corona Vírus.
